snippet: Research in Motion can't catch a break. Joining the large crop of businesses and organizations ditching the BlackBerry, the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration said it planned to provide employees with Apple's iPhones and iPads.

lead_paragraph: Research in Motion can't catch a break. Joining the large crop of businesses and organizations dropping the BlackBerry, the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration plans to provide employees with Apple's iPhones and iPads instead.

headline.main: Scientific Agency to Drop BlackBerry for iPhone
